eu.wauz.wauzcore.mobs.pets

Class WauzActivePet

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.mobs.pets.WauzActivePet

  • public class WauzActivePet
extends java.lang.Object
    A cached pet, currently summoned by a player.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
